bug.author: codesue
bug.summary: Fix usage examples for Avro executor and Parquet executor
bug.description: Change docstrings for the Avro executor and Parquet executor which still use executor_class instead of custom_executor_spec. This issue could be closed by PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfx/pull/2155>#2155</denchmark-link> .

comments.comment:
